mapper.select: SELECT u.phone, u.true_name, u.sex, DATE_FORMAT(u.birthday, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthday, u.qq, u.user_pic, (u.qb_balance+u.a_qb+u.b_qb+u.c_qb) qb_balance, c.type, c.company_name, c.part, c.work_address, c.doctor_pic, c.state, c.fail_reason, c.judge, c.medical_license, c.business_license, c.tax_registration, c.opening_permit, c.radiological_permit, c.id_card_positive, c.id_card_otherside FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN certification c ON u.user_id=c.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT user_id FROM certification WHERE user_id=#{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE certification SET state=1 WHERE user_id=#{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT IF(u.sale_id IS NOT NULL,1,2) AS isBindSale FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN sale_info s ON u.sale_id=s.sale_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT s.true_name AS saleName FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN sale_info s ON u.sale_id=s.sale_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT s.phone AS salePhone FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN sale_info s ON u.sale_id=s.sale_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId}
SELECT phone,true_name FROM sale_info WHERE phone=#{salePhone};
